name: You Are Not Alone (Hety06)
description:
If it's laggy try it in something other than chrome, or download the .exe!

Press P to pause and see all the controls, 'restart level' starts from the start of the level,  'reset game' will start from the very beginning of the game.

This game takes around 10 minutes to play and can be difficult at times, there are difficulty settings built in if you are struggling though, play at your own pace!

If you find any bugs... ignore them! 

Thank you for playing!

Follow my YouTube if you'd like to see a devlog on this game on the 31st of August

Made in 7 days for Brackey's Game Jam  2022.2

Theme: You're not alone

All assets made by me, except fonts and the player controller:

Player Controller : Here's the video
